title: Because location really is everything!
map_address: 1050 Wellness Place, Henderson NV 89011 near Gibson Rd.
posting_body: This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1201 Sq.
Welcome to The Well, a brand new apartment community in Henderson, Nevada, tailored to fit your ideal lifestyle.
LIVE WELL with thoughtful details such as quartz counters and large windows to let in the warm Nevada sunlight.
Enjoy the convenience of smart home features, such as activity notifications and lighting automation.
WELL by the pool, at the fitness center or in the lounge.
BE WELL in the heart of Union Village, the world's first integrated health village.
Anchored by Henderson Hospital, plans for Union Village include premium outdoor shopping, dining and entertainment venues, hotels, fitness clubs and more.
Call to schedule a tour today!
Walk-In Closets, Quartz Countertops, CASPAR Smart Home Technology, Modern, Flat-Panel Cabinets with Under-Cabinet Lighting, GE Stainless Steel Appliances, WiFi Ready with Modem &

Free, Provided by Cox, Glass Tile Kitchen Backsplashes, Spacious Studio, One-, Two- & Three-Bedroom Floor Plans, Wood-Style Plank Flooring, Choice of Two Stylish Interior Packages, Washers & Dryers, Private Patios & Balconies*
**Amenities may vary and are subject to change at any time.

Question Mark-Shaped Pool with Spa Deck, Chic Clubhouse with a Fireplace & Big-Screen TVs, Entertainment Kitchen with a Community Dining Space, Coffee Bar with TopBrewer App-Powered Espresso Machine, 24-Hour Fitness Center, 24/7 On-Demand Parcel Lockers, Sport Court & Playground, Game Room with Billiards, Conference Room, Outdoor Lounge with BBQ Grills
